citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:20 AM on January
24,2024. Inspector first knocked on the residence front door, then honked the horn and called and texted the number
given by the licensee. Approximately 15 minutes later the licensee called back and stated that they would not be able to
get home within one hour.
Additional Inspectors:
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:20 AM on January 
24,2024. Inspector first knocked on the residence front door, then honked the horn and called and texted the number 
given by the licensee. Approximately 15 minutes later the licensee called back and stated that they would not be able to 
get home within one hour. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
